issue.title: Don't auto-rotate doors when not hovered over a (vertical) wall segment

content.raw:
I've implemented your suggestion on a [branch](#!/osrf/gazebo/branch/hitl_issue_1357).

But how about when the user drags an existing door? The door is placed when the mouse button is released... I thought of not allowing the door to be detached from a wall, so even if the user drags away from any walls, the door moves along the closest wall.
